scripts.remove-live-reload: htmlprocessor index.html -o mod.html && mv index.html index.html.bak && mv mod.html index.html
scripts.dev: parallelshell "npm run live-reload -s" "npm run serve -s" "npm run watch -s"
scripts.commit: git add --all && git commit -m "Changes" && git push origin
scripts.deploy: npm run remove-live-reload && npm run commit && git push origin master:gh-pages && git checkout gh-pages && git pull && git checkout master && npm run add-live-reload && npm run commit
